subject: Grant of higher emoluments to Accountants and Stenographers on completion of five years of service on long term contract
text: #Rdy 7tz4 TTTHTT wrfearut Phone 91-11.25074100/25074200 Fa7, 43r 4raa7 &r TrHMf TATTT) Y4H / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 (YT WFR, Exln ; 2223 2318 2468 2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping; Road Transport and Highways) #-5 va' 6, 7azr-10, rat, T} R8vd-110 075 G-5 & '6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 th No. 11031/01/2000-Admn! 11 November , 2005 OFFICE ORDER Sub Grant of higher_emoluments to_ Accountants and_Stenographers_on completion of_ five_gears of_service_on long-term contract reg The request of long-term contract employees in the cadre of Stenographers and Accountants for grant of higher emoluments with reference to the next higher pay scale has been considered by the Competent Authority and it has been decided to grant consolidated emoluments ,to the Accountants (long-term) on st completion of five years service as on the cut off date of 1 January 1 July with reference to the pay scale of Rs. 5500-9000/- subject to their being found fit by the Selection Committee and clearance from vigilance angle; and ii) grant consolidated emoluments to the Stenographers (long-term) on completion of five years service as on the cut off date of 1st January 1 July with reference to the pay scale of Rs. 5500-9000/- subject to their qualifying the skill tests in Stenography and Computer Application and being clear from vigilance angle and found fit by the Selection Committee 40&t6 I)'Xl e5 (Jiwan Dass) DGM (Admn:) i) All officerslstaff ii) AlI Stenographers Accountants (on long terin contract) 178 7Hnt Duut NuA To,
